alert.note: Alert for Adams; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:41PM MDT until July 24 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Western Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 639 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Denver International Airport, or 14 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Wind gusts to 53 mph have been measured along Interstate 70 in northeast Denver. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... D.I.A Terminal and Concourses around 645 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
